metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47627 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: aiohttp is an asynchronous HTTP client/server framework for asyncio and Python. The HTTP parser in AIOHTTP has numerous problems with header parsing, which could lead to request smuggling. This parser is only used when AIOHTTP_NO_EXTENSIONS is enabled (or not using a prebuilt wheel). These bugs have been addressed in commit `d5c12ba89` which has been included in release version 3.8.6. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for these issues.

criterions.comment: python-aiohttp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
